name: Alabama Secretary of State
notes: Excel/ZIP downloads with precinct-level results back to 1946. No CSV.

name: Alaska Division of Elections
notes: CSV precinct-level downloads and PDF summaries. Results back to 1958. Uses ranked choice voting. Election night map at /enr/.

name: Arizona Secretary of State
notes: Dynamic JS app (returned 403). Also azsos.gov/elections/results-data for historical. XML press feeds via FTP. Official canvass PDFs after certification.

name: Arkansas Secretary of State
notes: Results from 1976-present. Older in PDF, recent use Clarity Elections interactive portals. Excel/XLS and ZIP archives.

name: California Secretary of State
notes: XLSX/CSV Statement of Vote files. Archive from 1990-present. Slow to certify (up to 38 days).

name: Colorado Secretary of State
notes: Excellent searchable database 1902-present with CSV export. Also Biennial Abstract PDFs. All-mail voting state.

name: Connecticut Secretary of the State
notes: CTEMS web portal for 2018+. Statement of Vote PDFs back to 1922. No CSV/Excel apparent.

name: Delaware Department of Elections
notes: CSV download option. Archive back to 1940. Some pages return 403 (bot protection).

name: Florida Division of Elections
notes: Tab-delimited ZIP downloads from 2012-present. Archive back to 1978. Election night at floridaelectionwatch.gov.

name: Georgia Secretary of State
notes: Dynamic Angular JS app â€” cannot be scraped. Bot protection on sos.ga.gov (403). Pre-2012 results as PDF only.

name: Hawaii Office of Elections
notes: Static HTML with jQuery tabs. PDF certified reports and text files. Results 1992-present. Scrapeable.

name: Idaho Secretary of State
notes: Interactive dashboard. PDF canvass reports and Excel files. Election night at results.voteidaho.gov. Archives back to 1994.

name: Illinois State Board of Elections
notes: ASP.NET app. Downloadable vote totals by year. Precinct-level since 2014. Also illinoiselectiondata.com for CSV.

name: Indiana Secretary of State
notes: Dynamic JS ENR app. Historical at indianavoters.in.gov/ENRHistorical. No CSV/Excel apparent.

name: Iowa Secretary of State
notes: Returns 403 (bot protection). Precinct totals as Excel. Archive at /elections/results/archive.html.

name: Kansas Secretary of State
notes: Static HTML with direct PDF and Excel download links. Precinct-level Excel for 2016+. Results 2004-present. Very scraper-friendly.

name: Kentucky State Board of Elections
notes: SharePoint site (403 to bots). Recap sheet documents. Election night at vrsws.sos.ky.gov/liveresults/.

name: Louisiana Secretary of State
notes: Dynamic AngularJS app. CSV export available (after 11 PM election night). Static archive at voterportal.sos.la.gov/static/.

name: Maine Secretary of State
notes: Static HTML with Excel spreadsheet downloads. Includes RCV tabulation data. Simple, scraper-friendly.

name: Maryland State Board of Elections
notes: Static HTML organized by decade (1980s-present). HTML tables for results. No bulk CSV/Excel. Scrapeable tables.

name: Secretary of the Commonwealth of Massachusetts
notes: PD43+ searchable database. Search by year/office/district. Only certified results (no election night). Sortable tables.

name: Michigan Secretary of State
notes: Returns 403 to bots. County-level data fragmented across 83 counties (many use Clarity Elections). No obvious bulk CSV.

name: Minnesota Secretary of State
notes: Bot protection (Radware challenge page). Excel/text precinct-level downloads when accessible. Updated every 15 min election night.

name: Mississippi Secretary of State
notes: Drupal CMS. Results 2003-present with links to individual elections. Scrapeable static link structure.

name: Missouri Secretary of State
notes: ASP.NET ENR app. Archives at enrarchives.sos.mo.gov. Previous elections page returns 403. ENR may be scrapeable via direct URLs.

name: Montana Secretary of State
notes: Returns 403. ASP.NET app. Downloadable state/legislative result files by county. Archives from 1912 at sosmt.gov/elections/archives/.

name: Nebraska Secretary of State
notes: Dynamic ASP.NET/JS app. Interactive with maps. No CSV/Excel downloads apparent. Results accessed through web interface.

name: Nevada Secretary of State
notes: Also nvsos.gov/sos/elections but behind Incapsula bot protection (403). May need browser-based access.

name: New Hampshire Secretary of State
notes: Returns 403 to bots. Likely has downloadable results when accessed via browser.

name: New Jersey Division of Elections
notes: Index page directing to county websites. Does NOT post election night results. Certified results organized by year. County clerks post ballot reports per P.L.2023 c.131.

name: New Mexico Secretary of State
notes: Also sos.nm.gov/voting-and-elections/election-results/. State Canvass Board certifies. Split filing deadlines (statewide Feb 3 / legislative Mar 10).

name: New York State Board of Elections
notes: Searchable database 1994-present. Individual contest pages by county. Returns 403 to bots. Election night at nyenr.elections.ny.gov. No bulk CSV.

name: North Carolina State Board of Elections
notes: Excellent data portal. Interactive dashboard. Historical CSV downloads at ncsbe.gov/results-data covering 20+ years precinct-level. Also via FTP. One of the best.

name: North Dakota Secretary of State
notes: Interactive JS app. Results 1980-present interactive, 1889-1980 as PDF. Legacy portal at vip.sos.nd.gov. SSL certificate issues.

name: Ohio Secretary of State
notes: Downloadable Excel (XLSX) files. Also NIST 1500-100 XML. Live results at liveresults.ohiosos.gov. Some 403 issues.

name: Oklahoma State Election Board
notes: Interactive JS viewer. Export tab for county/race/precinct downloads as compressed files. Historical back to 1907 at oklahoma.gov/elections.

name: Oregon Secretary of State
notes: Results 1902-present. PDF Abstract of Votes documents. Precinct data for recent elections. No CSV. Vote-by-mail state.

name: Pennsylvania Department of State
notes: JS app behind Incapsula bot protection. Excel downloads at pa.gov/agencies/dos/resources/voting-and-elections-resources/ for historical data.

name: Rhode Island Board of Elections
notes: Excellent. Excel (.xlsx) and PDF downloads 1976-2026. Interactive results at ri.gov/election/results/.

name: South Carolina Election Commission
notes: Clarity Elections platform (JS) at enr-scvotes.org for 2008+. Historical database at electionhistory.scvotes.gov. Pre-1996 by request.

name: South Dakota Secretary of State
notes: JS app with Exports section. Official returns archive back to 1889 as PDF at sdsos.gov.

name: Tennessee Secretary of State
notes: Excellent. PDF and Excel downloads 1996-2025. Precinct spreadsheets. Election night dashboard at elections.tn.gov.

name: Texas Secretary of State
notes: JS app with dropdown menus 1992-present. No bulk CSV/Excel. Archive at sos.texas.gov/elections/historical/.

name: Utah Lieutenant Governor's Office
notes: Angular JS app (hard to scrape). Tab-delimited data by request (elections@utah.gov). Historical 1960-2020 at vote.utah.gov. Run by Lt. Governor, not SoS.

name: Vermont Secretary of State
notes: Behind Incapsula bot protection. Also electionarchive.vermont.gov (SSL cert issues) covering 1789-2024.

name: Virginia Department of Elections
notes: Excellent. CSV files 2005+, JSON available. Data back to 1924. One of the best states for programmatic access.

name: Washington Secretary of State
notes: JS app with Export Results feature. ZIP data files. URL pattern: results.vote.wa.gov/results/YYYYMMDD/. Archives back to 1900 as PDF.

name: West Virginia Secretary of State
notes: Clarity Elections (JS) for 2018+. Older results at apps.sos.wv.gov/elections/results/. Clarity URLs change each cycle.

name: Wisconsin Elections Commission
notes: Returns 403 to bots. Excel county/ward reports and canvass PDFs. No centralized election night reporting (county-by-county).

name: Wyoming Secretary of State
notes: Good. ZIP files with Excel spreadsheets and PDFs 1996-2024. Statewide summaries include write-ins, undervotes, overvotes.
